text: Madeline Brewer (born May 1, 1992) is an American actress. She was born in Pitman, New Jersey. Brewer is best known for her roles in the Netflix original series Orange Is the New Black and Hemlock Grove. In 2016, she appeared in Black Mirror. Brewer stars in The Handmaid's Tale on Hulu. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New Jersey
title: Madeline Brewer
